descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Jigsaw Night is the most satisfying puzzle game you’ll want to play forever!

Build jigsaw puzzles in 3D space with pieces floating all around you. Play on your own, with family at home, or friends around the world!

**Fully Accessible**: It feels so real and natural to use. Use your hands or controllers to place pieces together. It’s the ultimate way to introduce new people into VR and MR.

**Intimately Social**: Play together in person. Build puzzles together in the same room while spending quality time in person using automated one-touch multiplayer. Perfect for family game night.

**Endlessly Personal**: With Facebook photo integration, build old memories and create new ones assembling puzzles with friends and family imported straight from decades of stored images that are served directly from Facebook itself.

**Spend time together from afar.** Play seamlessly with up to 4 other people. Avatars and voice chat make it feel like you’re together for real.

**Variety of puzzles to choose from.** Choose from a selection of curated puzzle imagery and settings for a custom experience.
